title: Uncovering Your Client Avatar
description:
The more you know about your ideal clients, the easier it will be to attract them.

On this week's TBOA, Rochelle and I talk about client avatars: what is it, how to create one, and why you should care.

Talking Points

  • What exactly is a client avatar?
  • Questions to ask yourself to uncover your client avatar
  • Deciding how many client avatars you should have
  • How to make ideal clients more receptive to your message
  • The value of sharing stories of transformation

Links

  • The Brain Audit by Sean D'Souza
  • Book Yourself Solid by Michael Port
  • Value-Based Fees by Alan Weiss

Enjoy!

—JS & RM
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
